TEXT.English: Welcome to Dale's Combat Mod! To turn components on or off please edit the value in GlobalDefinesAlt.xml for that components global tag. The following components are turned on.
TEXT.French: Welcome to Dale's Combat Mod! To turn components on or off please edit the value in GlobalDefinesAlt.xml for that components global tag. The following components are turned on.
TEXT.German: Welcome to Dale's Combat Mod! To turn components on or off please edit the value in GlobalDefinesAlt.xml for that components global tag. The following components are turned on.
TEXT.Italian: Witamy w scenariuszu bitewnym Dale'a! Jeäli chcesz wôáczyâ lub wyôáczyâ komponenty, wyedytuj odpowiadajáce im globalne tagi w GlobalDefinesAlt.xml. Masz wôáczone nastêpujáce komponenty.
TEXT.Spanish: Welcome to Dale's Combat Mod! To turn components on or off please edit the value in GlobalDefinesAlt.xml for that components global tag. The following components are turned on.

TEXT.English: [H1]Airbomb Missions[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]There are five different air-bombing missions for air units. "Airbomb defenses" allows you to bombard plot improvements or city defense percentage. "Airbomb buildings" allows you to attempt to destroy one of the city's buildings. "Airbomb Factories" allows you to attempt to destroy one of the city's production buildings. "Port airbomb" allows you to attempt to damage a ship in the port, with a chance to sink her. "Strategic Airbomb" allows you to attempt to damage the current production project of the city. The airbomb missions are all subject to air interceptions.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.French: [H1]Airbomb Missions[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]There are five different air-bombing missions for air units. "Airbomb defenses" allows you to bombard plot improvements or city defense percentage. "Airbomb buildings" allows you to attempt to destroy one of the city's buildings. "Airbomb Factories" allows you to attempt to destroy one of the city's production buildings. "Port airbomb" allows you to attempt to damage a ship in the port, with a chance to sink her. "Strategic Airbomb" allows you to attempt to damage the current production project of the city. The airbomb missions are all subject to air interceptions.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.German: [H1]Airbomb Missions[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]There are five different air-bombing missions for air units. "Airbomb defenses" allows you to bombard plot improvements or city defense percentage. "Airbomb buildings" allows you to attempt to destroy one of the city's buildings. "Airbomb Factories" allows you to attempt to destroy one of the city's production buildings. "Port airbomb" allows you to attempt to damage a ship in the port, with a chance to sink her. "Strategic Airbomb" allows you to attempt to damage the current production project of the city. The airbomb missions are all subject to air interceptions.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Italian: [H1]Misje nalotów bombowych[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Jednostki lotnicze mogá przeprowadziâ piêâ róënych misji nalotów bombowych. "Nalot na instalacje" pozwala ci niszczyâ ulepszenia terenu i miejskie instalacje obronne. W "nalocie na budynki" starasz siê zniszczyâ jeden z budynków w mieäcie. Jeäli chcesz zniszczyâ fabrykê, wybierz "nalot na fabrykê". Wybierajác "nalot na port" moëesz zatopiâ jeden ze stojácych w nim okrêtów, natomiast poprzez "nalot strategiczny" usiôujesz zniszczyâ aktualná produkcjê w mieäcie. Kaëdy nalot moëe zostaâ udaremniony przez myäliwce nieprzyjaciela.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Spanish: [H1]Airbomb Missions[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]There are five different air-bombing missions for air units. "Airbomb defenses" allows you to bombard plot improvements or city defense percentage. "Airbomb buildings" allows you to attempt to destroy one of the city's buildings. "Airbomb Factories" allows you to attempt to destroy one of the city's production buildings. "Port airbomb" allows you to attempt to damage a ship in the port, with a chance to sink her. "Strategic Airbomb" allows you to attempt to damage the current production project of the city. The airbomb missions are all subject to air interceptions.[PARAGRAPH:2]

TEXT.English: "Airbomb defenses" allows you to bombard plot improvements or city defense percentage.
TEXT.French: "Airbomb defenses" allows you to bombard plot improvements or city defense percentage.
TEXT.German: "Airbomb defenses" allows you to bombard plot improvements or city defense percentage.
TEXT.Italian: "Nalot na instalacje" - pozwala zbombardowaâ ulepszenia terenu lub miejskie instalacje obronne.
TEXT.Spanish: "Airbomb defenses" allows you to bombard plot improvements or city defense percentage.

TEXT.English: "Airbomb buildings" allows you to attempt to destroy one of the city's buildings.
TEXT.French: "Airbomb buildings" allows you to attempt to destroy one of the city's buildings.
TEXT.German: "Airbomb buildings" allows you to attempt to destroy one of the city's buildings.
TEXT.Italian: "Nalot na budynki" - pozwala zbombardowaâ jeden z budynków w mieäcie.
TEXT.Spanish: "Airbomb buildings" allows you to attempt to destroy one of the city's buildings.

TEXT.English: "Airbomb Factories" allows you to attempt to destroy one of the city's production buildings.
TEXT.French: "Airbomb Factories" allows you to attempt to destroy one of the city's production buildings.
TEXT.German: "Airbomb Factories" allows you to attempt to destroy one of the city's production buildings.
TEXT.Italian: "Nalot na fabryki" - pozwala zbombardowaâ jedná z fabryk w mieäcie.
TEXT.Spanish: "Airbomb Factories" allows you to attempt to destroy one of the city's production buildings.

TEXT.English: "Port airbomb" allows you to attempt to damage a ship in the port, with a chance to sink her.
TEXT.French: "Port airbomb" allows you to attempt to damage a ship in the port, with a chance to sink her.
TEXT.German: "Port airbomb" allows you to attempt to damage a ship in the port, with a chance to sink her.
TEXT.Italian: "Nalot na port" - pozwala zbombardowaâ i zatopiâ jeden z okrêtów stojácych w porcie.
TEXT.Spanish: "Port airbomb" allows you to attempt to damage a ship in the port, with a chance to sink her.

TEXT.English: "Strategic Airbomb" allows you to attempt to damage the current production project of the city.
TEXT.French: "Strategic Airbomb" allows you to attempt to damage the current production project of the city.
TEXT.German: "Strategic Airbomb" allows you to attempt to damage the current production project of the city.
TEXT.Italian: "Nalot strategiczny" - pozwala zbombardowaâ aktualná produkcjê w mieäcie.
TEXT.Spanish: "Strategic Airbomb" allows you to attempt to damage the current production project of the city.

TEXT.English: Select an air unit that can airbomb, select the airbomb defense mission, then click on the target city to reduce defense, or target improvement to destroy it.
TEXT.French: Sélectionnez une unité aérienne capable de bombarder, puis la mission de bombardement de défenses. Cliquez ensuite sur la cible pour réduire son pourcentage de défense ou ciblez une amélioration de terrain pour la détruire.
TEXT.German: Wählen Sie eine Lufteinheit, die Luftbombardierungen durchführen kann, aktivieren Sie die Mission "Luftbombardierung Verteidigungen" und klicken Sie dann auf die Zielstadt, um deren Verteidigung zu schwächen, oder auf eine Modernisierung, um diese zu zerstören.
TEXT.Italian: Wybierz jednostkê zdolná do przeprowadzenia nalotu, misjê "nalot na instalacje", a nastêpnie wskaë miasto, które chcesz osôabiâ (lub ulepszenie w terenie, które masz zamiar zniszczyâ).
TEXT.Spanish: Se elige una unidad que pueda realizar bombardeos aéreos, la misión de bombardear defensas y se hace clic en la ciudad objetivo (para reducir su defensa) o en la mejora objetivo (para destruirla).

TEXT.English: Select an air unit that can airbomb, select the airbomb building mission, then click on the target city to attempt to destroy one civil building.
TEXT.French: Sélectionnez une unité aérienne capable de bombarder, puis la mission de bombardement de bâtiments civils. Cliquez ensuite sur la cible pour tenter de détruire un bâtiment civil.
TEXT.German: Wählen Sie eine Lufteinheit, die Luftbombardierungen durchführen kann, wählen Sie die Mission "Luftbombardierung Zivile Gebäude" und klicken Sie dann auf die Zielstadt, um zu versuchen, dort ein ziviles Gebäude zu zerstören.
TEXT.Italian: Wybierz jednostkê zdolná do przeprowadzenia nalotu, misjê "nalot na budynki", a nastêpnie wskaë miasto, w którym chcesz zniszczyâ jeden z budynków cywilnych.
TEXT.Spanish: Se elige una unidad que pueda realizar bombardeos aéreos, la misión de bombardear edificios civiles y se hace clic en la ciudad objetivo para intentar destruir un edificio civil.

TEXT.English: Select an air unit that can airbomb, select the airbomb production mission, then click on the target city to attempt to destroy one factory.
TEXT.French: Sélectionnez une unité aérienne capable de bombarder, puis la mission de bombardement d'infrastructure de production. Cliquez ensuite sur la cible pour tenter de détruire une usine.
TEXT.German: Wählen Sie eine Lufteinheit, die Luftbombardierungen durchführen kann, aktivieren Sie die Mission "Luftbombardierung Produktion" und klicken Sie dann auf die Zielstadt, um zu versuchen, dort eine Fabrik zu zerstören.
TEXT.Italian: Wybierz jednostkê zdolná do przeprowadzenia nalotu, misjê "nalot na fabryki", a nastêpnie wskaë miasto, w którym chcesz zniszczyâ fabrykê.
TEXT.Spanish: Se elige una unidad que pueda realizar bombardeos aéreos, la misión de bombardear fábricas y se hace clic en la ciudad objetivo para intentar destruir una fábrica.

TEXT.English: Select an air unit that can airbomb, select the port airbomb mission, then click on the target city to damage and attempt to sink a ship.
TEXT.French: Select an air unit that can airbomb, select the port airbomb mission, then click on the target city to damage and attempt to sink a ship.
TEXT.German: Select an air unit that can airbomb, select the port airbomb mission, then click on the target city to damage and attempt to sink a ship.
TEXT.Italian: Wybierz jednostkê zdolná do przeprowadzenia nalotu, misjê "nalot na porty", a nastêpnie wskaë miasto, w którym chcesz zatopiâ okrêt.
TEXT.Spanish: Select an air unit that can airbomb, select the port airbomb mission, then click on the target city to damage and attempt to sink a ship.

TEXT.English: Select an air unit that can airbomb, select the strategic airbomb mission, then click on the target city to damage the current production project.
TEXT.French: Select an air unit that can airbomb, select the strategic airbomb mission, then click on the target city to damage the current production project.
TEXT.German: Select an air unit that can airbomb, select the strategic airbomb mission, then click on the target city to damage the current production project.
TEXT.Italian: Wybierz jednostkê zdolná do przeprowadzenia nalotu, misjê "nalot strategiczny", a nastêpnie wskaë miasto, w którym chcesz zniszczyâ aktualná produkcjê.
TEXT.Spanish: Select an air unit that can airbomb, select the strategic airbomb mission, then click on the target city to damage the current production project.

TEXT.English: [H1]Battle Effects[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Battle Effects are effects that occur on the map due to combat. When combat occurs on a plot, a Battle Effect will begin. This effect will be retained for a few turns and affects how much gold and food a plot can produce. The Battle Effect disipates after a couple of turns, but subsequent combats will increase the time before the effects disappear.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.French: [H1]Battle Effects[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Battle Effects are effects that occur on the map due to combat. When combat occurs on a plot, a Battle Effect will begin. This effect will be retained for a few turns and affects how much gold and food a plot can produce. The Battle Effect disipates after a couple of turns, but subsequent combats will increase the time before the effects disappear.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.German: [H1]Battle Effects[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Battle Effects are effects that occur on the map due to combat. When combat occurs on a plot, a Battle Effect will begin. This effect will be retained for a few turns and affects how much gold and food a plot can produce. The Battle Effect disipates after a couple of turns, but subsequent combats will increase the time before the effects disappear.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Italian: [H1]Skutki bitwy[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Bitwy skutkujá zmianami na mapie, które utrzymujá siê przez kilka tur. W ich efekcie dane pole moëe przynosiâ mniej dochodu lub produkowaâ mniej ëywnoäci. Kolejne walki w danym polu powodujá wydôuëone utrzymywanie siê skutków bitwy.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Spanish: [H1]Battle Effects[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Battle Effects are effects that occur on the map due to combat. When combat occurs on a plot, a Battle Effect will begin. This effect will be retained for a few turns and affects how much gold and food a plot can produce. The Battle Effect disipates after a couple of turns, but subsequent combats will increase the time before the effects disappear.[PARAGRAPH:2]

TEXT.English: [H1]Civ Customiser[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Civ Customiser allows players to customise their Civs before play begins. You can choose what Leaderhead, Traits, Technologies, Unique Units and Unique Buildings will apply to your Civ. Some of the options allow for random attributes to be applied, such as random traits.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.French: [H1]Civ Customiser[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Civ Customiser allows players to customise their Civs before play begins. You can choose what Leaderhead, Traits, Technologies, Unique Units and Unique Buildings will apply to your Civ. Some of the options allow for random attributes to be applied, such as random traits.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.German: [H1]Civ Customiser[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Civ Customiser allows players to customise their Civs before play begins. You can choose what Leaderhead, Traits, Technologies, Unique Units and Unique Buildings will apply to your Civ. Some of the options allow for random attributes to be applied, such as random traits.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Italian: [H1]Ustawienia gry[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Tutaj moëesz zmieniâ podstawowe ustawienia gry, zanim rozpocznie siê zabawa. Moëesz wybraâ dla swojego pañstwa przywódcê, jego cechy, technologie, specjalne jednostki oraz budynki. Niektóre z opcji dopuszczajá losowy wybór atrybutów, np. losowe cechy.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Spanish: [H1]Civ Customiser[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Civ Customiser allows players to customise their Civs before play begins. You can choose what Leaderhead, Traits, Technologies, Unique Units and Unique Buildings will apply to your Civ. Some of the options allow for random attributes to be applied, such as random traits.[PARAGRAPH:2]

TEXT.English: [H1]Ranged Bombardment[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Ranged Bombardment allows siege units to bombard in the field (as opposed to only bombarding cities). By selecting the bombard icon you can select whether to bombard units, improvements or cities. As well, bombarding is possible from a range. Thus in Road to War, standard artillery will be able to bombard into adjacent plots, whilst heavy artillery can bombard into plots up to 2 plots away.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.French: [H1]Bombardement à distance [\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Un bombardement à distance permet aux unités de siège d'effectuer des bombardements de terrain (par opposition aux bombardements de cités). En sélectionnant l'icone Bombardement, vous pouvez choisir de bombarder des unités, des améliorations de terrain ou des villes. Vous pouvez également bombarder à distance. Dans "Sentiers de la guerre", l'artillerie standard peut bombarder des cases adjacentes tandis que l'artillerie lourde est autorisée à tirer jusqu'à une distance de deux cases.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.German: [H1]Fernbombardierung[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Die Fernbombardierung ermöglicht Belagerungseinheiten, auch offenes Gelände zu bombardieren (statt ausschließlich Städte). Durch Auswahl des Symbols Bombardierung können Sie wählen, ob Einheiten, Modernisierungen oder Städte bombardiert werden sollen. Darüber hinaus sind auch Bombardierungsangriffe aus der Ferne möglich: In Road to War kann die Standardartillerie benachbarte Geländefelder und die schwere Artillerie bis zu 2 Geländefelder entfernt bombardieren.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Italian: [H1]Ostrzaô artyleryjski[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Ostrzaô artyleryjski pozwala jednostkom oblêëniczym atakowaâ teren (a nie tylko miasta). Wybierajác ikonê ostrzaôu, okreälasz cel: jednostki wojskowe, ulepszenia lub miasta. Moëesz takëe atakowaâ z dystansu. W module "Road to War" artyleria zwykôa atakuje tylko pola przylegôe, a artyleria ciêëka - na odlegôoäâ dwóch pól.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Spanish: [H1]Cañoneo de alcance[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]El cañoneo de alcance permite a las unidades de asedio cañonear el campo de batalla (al contrario que bombardear solo ciudades). Si se selecciona el icono de cañoneo, se puede elegir entre bombardear unidades, mejoras o ciudades. También se puede cañonear desde una distancia. Por lo tanto, en "The Road to War", la artillería estándar podrá bombardear casillas adyacentes, mientras que la pesada podrá hacerlo hasta a 2 casillas de distancia.[PARAGRAPH:2]

TEXT.English: [H1]Ranged Bombardment[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Ranged Bombardment allows siege units to bombard in the field (as opposed to only bombarding cities). By selecting the bombard icon you can select whether to bombard units, improvements or cities. As well, bombarding is possible from a range. Thus in Road to War, standard artillery will be able to bombard into adjacent plots, whilst heavy artillery can bombard into plots up to 2 plots away.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.French: [H1]Bombardement à distance [\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Le bombardement à distance permet aux unités de siège d'effectuer des bombardements de terrain (par opposition aux bombardements de cités). En sélectionnant l'icone Bombardement vous pouvez choisir de bombarder des unités, des améliorations de terrain ou des villes. Le bombardement à distance est également possible. Dans "Les sentiers de la guerre", l'artillerie standard peut bombarder des cases adjacentes tandis que l'artillerie lourde est autorisée à tirer jusqu'à une distance de deux cases.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.German: [H1]Fernbombardierung[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Die Fernbombardierung ermöglicht Belagerungseinheiten, auch offenes Gelände zu bombardieren (statt ausschließlich Städte). Durch Auswahl des Symbols Bombardierung können Sie wählen, ob Einheiten, Modernisierungen oder Städte bombardiert werden sollen. Darüber hinaus sind auch Bombardierungsangriffe aus der Ferne möglich: In Road to War kann die Standardartillerie benachbarte Geländefelder und die schwere Artillerie bis zu 2 Geländefelder entfernt bombardieren.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Italian: [H1]Ostrzaô artyleryjski[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Ostrzaô artyleryjski pozwala jednostkom oblêëniczym atakowaâ teren (a nie tylko miasta). Wybierajác ikonê ostrzaôu, okreälasz cel: jednostki wojskowe, ulepszenia lub miasta. Moëesz takëe atakowaâ z dystansu. W module "Road to War" artyleria zwykôa atakuje tylko pola przylegôe, a artyleria ciêëka - na odlegôoäâ dwóch pól.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Spanish: [H1]Cañoneo de alcance[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]El cañoneo de alcance permite a las unidades de asedio cañonear el campo de batalla (al contrario que bombardear solo ciudades). Si se selecciona el icono de cañoneo, se puede elegir entre bombardear unidades, mejoras o ciudades. También se puede cañonear desde una distancia. Por lo tanto, en "The Road to War", la artillería estándar podrá bombardear casillas adyacentes, mientras que la pesada podrá hacerlo hasta a 2 casillas de distancia.[PARAGRAPH:2]

TEXT.English: Select an artillery unit, select the bombard mission, then click on the plot to bombard.
TEXT.French: Sélectionnez une unité d'artillerie puis une mission de bombardement. Cliquez ensuite sur la case à bombarder.
TEXT.German: Wählen Sie eine Artillerieeinheit, aktivieren Sie die Mission "Bombardierung" und klicken Sie dann auf das Geländefeld, das bombardiert werden soll.
TEXT.Italian: Wybierz jednostkê artylerii, ikonê ostrzaôu, a nastêpnie pole, które chcesz zaatakowaâ.
TEXT.Spanish: Se elige una unidad de artillería, una misión de bombardeo y se hace clic en la casilla a bombardear.

TEXT.English: Select the nation to take control of.
TEXT.French: Select the nation to take control of.
TEXT.German: Select the nation to take control of.
TEXT.Spanish: Select the nation to take control of.

TEXT.English: You have changed Civ too many times. You will not be able to change Civ again.
TEXT.French: You have changed Civ too many times. You will not be able to change Civ again.
TEXT.German: You have changed Civ too many times. You will not be able to change Civ again.
TEXT.Italian: Zmieniôeä pañstwo zbyt wiele razy. Dalsze zmiany nie sá moëliwe.
TEXT.Spanish: You have changed Civ too many times. You will not be able to change Civ again.

TEXT.English: [H1]Civ Changer[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Civ Changer allows you to change the Civ you are playing in-game. Depending on the options set in GlobalDefinesAlt.xml determines what Civs are available to change with, and how many times per game you can change. By default, you can change twice with Civs which you have contact with. Other options include being restricted to Civs on your continent, Team members, or just every Civ in play.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.French: [H1]Civ Changer[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Civ Changer allows you to change the Civ you are playing in-game. Depending on the options set in GlobalDefinesAlt.xml determines what Civs are available to change with, and how many times per game you can change. By default, you can change twice with Civs which you have contact with. Other options include being restricted to Civs on your continent, Team members, or just every Civ in play.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.German: [H1]Civ Changer[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Civ Changer allows you to change the Civ you are playing in-game. Depending on the options set in GlobalDefinesAlt.xml determines what Civs are available to change with, and how many times per game you can change. By default, you can change twice with Civs which you have contact with. Other options include being restricted to Civs on your continent, Team members, or just every Civ in play.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Italian: [H1]Zmiana pañstwa[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Tutaj moëesz zmieniâ pañstwo, którym grasz. Ustawienia zapisane w pliku GlobalDefinesAlt.xml okreälajá, ile i jakich zmian moëesz dokonaâ. Standardowo moëesz zrobiâ dwie zmiany miêdzy pañstwami, z którymi masz kontakt. Przy innych ustawieniach zmiana moëe byâ ograniczona do twojego kontynentu, czôonków druëyny, albo teë nie mieâ ëadnych ograniczeñ.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Spanish: [H1]Civ Changer[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Civ Changer allows you to change the Civ you are playing in-game. Depending on the options set in GlobalDefinesAlt.xml determines what Civs are available to change with, and how many times per game you can change. By default, you can change twice with Civs which you have contact with. Other options include being restricted to Civs on your continent, Team members, or just every Civ in play.[PARAGRAPH:2]

TEXT.English: Your %s1_UnitName has gained opportunity fire on a %s2_EnUName!
TEXT.French: Your %s1_UnitName has gained opportunity fire on a %s2_EnUName!
TEXT.German: Your %s1_UnitName has gained opportunity fire on a %s2_EnUName!
TEXT.Italian: Twoja jednostka: %s1_UnitName odpowiedziaôa ogniem na atak jednostki: %s2_EnUName!
TEXT.Spanish: Your %s1_UnitName has gained opportunity fire on a %s2_EnUName!

TEXT.English: A %s1_EnUName has gained opportunity fire on your %s2_UnitName!
TEXT.French: A %s1_EnUName has gained opportunity fire on your %s2_UnitName!
TEXT.German: A %s1_EnUName has gained opportunity fire on your %s2_UnitName!
TEXT.Italian: Nieprzyjacielska jednostka: %s1_EnUName odpowiedziaôa ogniem na atak twojej jednostki: %s2_UnitName!
TEXT.Spanish: A %s1_EnUName has gained opportunity fire on your %s2_UnitName!

TEXT.English: [H1]Combined Arms Stack Attack[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Combined Arms Stack Attack allows a full stack of units to engage an enemy stack of units. It replaces the one-on-one combat concept and allows a full stack to work together to elliminate an enemy stack.[PARAGRAPH:2]When a stack engages another stack, air units on location will fly sorties, bombard capable units will barrage the enemy, ranged (eg: archers) units will rain arrows from behind lines whilst melee troops will engage the enemy front line.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.French: [H1]Combined Arms Stack Attack[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Combined Arms Stack Attack allows a full stack of units to engage an enemy stack of units. It replaces the one-on-one combat concept and allows a full stack to work together to elliminate an enemy stack.[PARAGRAPH:2]When a stack engages another stack, air units on location will fly sorties, bombard capable units will barrage the enemy, ranged (eg: archers) units will rain arrows from behind lines whilst melee troops will engage the enemy front line.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.German: [H1]Combined Arms Stack Attack[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Combined Arms Stack Attack allows a full stack of units to engage an enemy stack of units. It replaces the one-on-one combat concept and allows a full stack to work together to elliminate an enemy stack.[PARAGRAPH:2]When a stack engages another stack, air units on location will fly sorties, bombard capable units will barrage the enemy, ranged (eg: archers) units will rain arrows from behind lines whilst melee troops will engage the enemy front line.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Italian: [H1]Atak zbiorowy[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]W ataku zbiorowym biorá udziaô wszystkie jednostki z danego pola, atakujác wszystkie zgrupowane jednostki przeciwnika. Zamiast toczyâ szereg pojedynków jeden na jednego, moëesz próbowaâ zlikwidowaâ nieprzyjaciela za jednym zamachem.[PARAGRAPH:2]W ataku zbiorowym kaëdy oddziaô przeprowadza atak: lotnictwo dokonuje nalotów, artyleria ostrzeliwuje wroga, jednostki dziaôajáce na odlegôoäâ (np. ôucznicy) zasypujá nieprzyjacióô strzaôami, a jednostki piechoty ruszajá do boju.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Spanish: [H1]Combined Arms Stack Attack[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Combined Arms Stack Attack allows a full stack of units to engage an enemy stack of units. It replaces the one-on-one combat concept and allows a full stack to work together to elliminate an enemy stack.[PARAGRAPH:2]When a stack engages another stack, air units on location will fly sorties, bombard capable units will barrage the enemy, ranged (eg: archers) units will rain arrows from behind lines whilst melee troops will engage the enemy front line.[PARAGRAPH:2]

TEXT.English: [H1]Opportunity Fire[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Opportunity Fire allows fortified bombard capable units (such as artillery) to automatically barrage enemy units which close on the fortified unit's location. This process is undertaken at the start of that unit's turn.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.French: [H1]Opportunity Fire[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Opportunity Fire allows fortified bombard capable units (such as artillery) to automatically barrage enemy units which close on the fortified unit's location. This process is undertaken at the start of that unit's turn.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.German: [H1]Opportunity Fire[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Opportunity Fire allows fortified bombard capable units (such as artillery) to automatically barrage enemy units which close on the fortified unit's location. This process is undertaken at the start of that unit's turn.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Italian: [H1]Odpowiedé ogniem[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Okopane jednostki bombardujáce (np. artyleria) mogá automatycznie ostrzelaâ zbliëajácego siê nieprzyjaciela. Akcja ta zachodzi na poczátku ruchu danej jednostki.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Spanish: [H1]Opportunity Fire[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Opportunity Fire allows fortified bombard capable units (such as artillery) to automatically barrage enemy units which close on the fortified unit's location. This process is undertaken at the start of that unit's turn.[PARAGRAPH:2]

TEXT.English: [H1]Active Defense[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Active Defense allows patrolling fighters to engage enemy troops closing on them. This includes fighters on patrol in any location (city, carrier, etc). They will automatically engage the enemy in an airstrike when the enemy comes within 2 plots of the aircraft.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.French: [H1]Active Defense[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Active Defense allows patrolling fighters to engage enemy troops closing on them. This includes fighters on patrol in any location (city, carrier, etc). They will automatically engage the enemy in an airstrike when the enemy comes within 2 plots of the aircraft.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.German: [H1]Active Defense[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Active Defense allows patrolling fighters to engage enemy troops closing on them. This includes fighters on patrol in any location (city, carrier, etc). They will automatically engage the enemy in an airstrike when the enemy comes within 2 plots of the aircraft.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Italian: [H1]Aktywna obrona[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Samoloty myäliwskie patrolujáce dany obszar (miasto, lotniskowiec itp.) mogá zaatakowaâ zbliëajáce siê jednostki nieprzyjaciela. Automatyczny atak ma zasiêg dwóch pól.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Spanish: [H1]Active Defense[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Active Defense allows patrolling fighters to engage enemy troops closing on them. This includes fighters on patrol in any location (city, carrier, etc). They will automatically engage the enemy in an airstrike when the enemy comes within 2 plots of the aircraft.[PARAGRAPH:2]

TEXT.English: [H1]Archer Bombard[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Archer Bombard allows archer units to bombard enemy units in adjacent plots. Similar to Ranged Bombardment, Archer Bombard also damages the enemy unit.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.French: [H1]Archer Bombard[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Archer Bombard allows archer units to bombard enemy units in adjacent plots. Similar to Ranged Bombardment, Archer Bombard also damages the enemy unit.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.German: [H1]Archer Bombard[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Archer Bombard allows archer units to bombard enemy units in adjacent plots. Similar to Ranged Bombardment, Archer Bombard also damages the enemy unit.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Italian: [H1]Deszcz strzaô[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Jednostki ôucznicze mogá zasypaâ deszczem strzaô jednostki nieprzyjaciela znajdujáce siê w przylegôym polu, osiágajác efekt zbliëony do ostrzaôu artyleryjskiego.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Spanish: [H1]Archer Bombard[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Archer Bombard allows archer units to bombard enemy units in adjacent plots. Similar to Ranged Bombardment, Archer Bombard also damages the enemy unit.[PARAGRAPH:2]

TEXT.English: "Archer Bombard" allows you to bombard an adjacent plot with your archers to damage enemy units.
TEXT.French: "Archer Bombard" allows you to bombard an adjacent plot with your archers to damage enemy units.
TEXT.German: "Archer Bombard" allows you to bombard an adjacent plot with your archers to damage enemy units.
TEXT.Italian: Jednostki ôucznicze mogá zasypaâ deszczem strzaô przylegôe jednostki nieprzyjaciela.
TEXT.Spanish: "Archer Bombard" allows you to bombard an adjacent plot with your archers to damage enemy units.

TEXT.English: Select an archer unit, select the archer bombard mission and then select the enemy unit to fire at.
TEXT.French: Select an archer unit, select the archer bombard mission and then select the enemy unit to fire at.
TEXT.German: Select an archer unit, select the archer bombard mission and then select the enemy unit to fire at.
TEXT.Italian: Wybierz jednostkê ôuczników, ikonê deszczu strzaô, a nastêpnie cel ataku.
TEXT.Spanish: Select an archer unit, select the archer bombard mission and then select the enemy unit to fire at.

TEXT.English: Use the A-Bomb to decimate an enemy city.
TEXT.French: Utiliser la bombe A pour anéantir une ville ennemie.
TEXT.German: Setzen Sie eine Atombombe ein, um die Bevölkerung einer feindlichen Stadt zu dezimieren.
TEXT.Italian: Aby zdziesiátkowaâ miasto nieprzyjaciela, uëyj bomby atomowej.
TEXT.Spanish: Usa la bomba A para diezmar una ciudad enemiga.

TEXT.Italian: Twój atak jednostká: %s1_UnitName nie osiágnáô celu.

TEXT.English: An enemy %s1_EnUName has missed its target.
TEXT.French: An enemy %s1_EnUName has missed its target.
TEXT.German: An enemy %s1_EnUName has missed its target.
TEXT.Italian: Nieprzyjacielski atak jednostká: %s1_EnUName nie osiágnáô celu.
TEXT.Spanish: An enemy %s1_EnUName has missed its target.

TEXT.English: [H1]Fighter Engagement[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Fighter Engagement allows fighters to attack enemy fighters in the air or on the ground.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.French: [H1]Fighter Engagement[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Fighter Engagement allows fighters to attack enemy fighters in the air or on the ground.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.German: [H1]Fighter Engagement[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Fighter Engagement allows fighters to attack enemy fighters in the air or on the ground.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Italian: [H1]Atak myäliwców[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Twoje myäliwce mogá zaatakowaâ myäliwce nieprzyjaciela znajdujáce siê w powietrzu lub stojáce na lotnisku.[PARAGRAPH:2]
TEXT.Spanish: [H1]Fighter Engagement[\H1][PARAGRAPH:2]Fighter Engagement allows fighters to attack enemy fighters in the air or on the ground.[PARAGRAPH:2]

TEXT.English: "Fighter Engagement" allows fighters to attack enemy fighters in the air or on the ground.
TEXT.French: "Fighter Engagement" allows fighters to attack enemy fighters in the air or on the ground.
TEXT.German: "Fighter Engagement" allows fighters to attack enemy fighters in the air or on the ground.
TEXT.Italian: Twoje myäliwce mogá zaatakowaâ myäliwce nieprzyjaciela znajdujáce siê w powietrzu lub stojáce na lotnisku.
TEXT.Spanish: "Fighter Engagement" allows fighters to attack enemy fighters in the air or on the ground.

TEXT.English: Select a fighter unit, select the fighter engagement mission and then select the enemy unit to attack.
TEXT.French: Select a fighter unit, select the fighter engagement mission and then select the enemy unit to attack.
TEXT.German: Select a fighter unit, select the fighter engagement mission and then select the enemy unit to attack.
TEXT.Italian: Wybierz jednostkê myäliwców, misjê ataku oraz cel.
TEXT.Spanish: Select a fighter unit, select the fighter engagement mission and then select the enemy unit to attack.

TEXT.English: Welcome to the Road to War! Exclusive Road to War content, only available through http://www.DalesZone.com will include new Leaders, a new Pacific map starting in 1941, event movies and a new global map starting in 1936![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]I hope you enjoy the Road to War as much as I enjoyed making it.[NEWLINE]Dale[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Dale Kent - Designer and Developer[NEWLINE]David Sobotka - Movies and Interface[NEWLINE]Tony Kiehl - Unit/Leader/Terrain Artwork[NEWLINE]Thank you to the unit makers of CivFanatics.
TEXT.French: Welcome to the Road to War! TEXT.Italian: Witaj w module "Road to War"! Ten oryginalny scenariusz jest dostêpny wyôácznie pod adresem http://www.DalesZone.com i zawiera takie nowoäci jak nowi Przywódcy, nowa mapa regionu Pacyfiku z roku 1941, nowe filmy i nowa mapa äwiata z roku 1936![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Mam nadziejê, ëe granie w ten moduô sprawi Ci tyle przyjemnoäci, ile mnie sprawiôo napisanie go.[NEWLINE]Dale[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Dale Kent - projekt i opracowanie[NEWLINE]David Sobotka - filmy i interface[NEWLINE]Tony Kiehl - opracowanie graficzne Jednostek, Przywódców i Terenu[NEWLINE]Dziêkujemy fanom za opracowanie jednostek!
TEXT.Spanish: Welcome to the Road to War! Exclusive Road to War content, only available through http://www.DalesZone.com will include new Leaders, a new Pacific map starting in 1941, event movies and a new global map starting in 1936![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]I hope you enjoy the Road to War as much as I enjoyed making it.[NEWLINE]Dale[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Dale Kent - Designer and Developer[NEWLINE]David Sobotka - Movies and Interface[NEWLINE]Tony Kiehl - Unit/Leader/Terrain Artwork[NEWLINE]Thank you to the unit makers of CivFanatics.
